statements: DELETE FROM BatteryUsage WHERE drone_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00';
DELETE FROM BatteryUsage WHERE drone_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM BatteryUsage WHERE charging_cycles >= 10 AND battery_level < 50;
DELETE FROM BatteryUsage WHERE drone_id = 1 AND usage_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM ChargingCycles WHERE charging_cycle_id = 100 AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM BatteryUsage WHERE drone_id = 50 AND usage_date < '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM ChargingStations WHERE location = 'Station A';
DELETE FROM DroneChargingHistory WHERE history_id = 5 AND drone_id = 10;
DELETE FROM charging_sessions WHERE start_time < '2022-01-01' AND end_time > '2022-01-10';
